text: Lois Clark (1884-1967) was an American botanist, bryologist, and professor who studied plants of the Northwestern United States, particularly the genus Frullania. She taught at the University of Idaho and the University of Washington. == Works == * * * * ==References== Category:1884 births Category:1967 deaths Category:American botanists Category:American women scientists Category:Bryologists Category:Place of birth missing Category:Place of death missing Category:University of Idaho faculty Category:University of Washington faculty
title: Lois Clark
